Text:
lassification: Mini-Series
Genre: Drama | Family
Status: New Series
Network: BBC One ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Fridays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: December 07, 2012
Episode Order: 2

"Restless" is based on the novel written by British novelist William Boyd and tells the story of a daughter who finds out that her mother was recruited as a spy during the second world war. It's a story of wartime espionage, love and betrayal and also lifts the lid on one of the last secrets of World War II.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-33417)
